sentence: COLUMBUS, Ohio (WCMH) – Debate season for Ohio’s open U.S. Senate seat kicked off Thursday night at North Columbus Baptist Church, where Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper squared off despite the primary election still being months away.
